name: polymer-analyzer

scripts.benchmark: npm run build && npm run initBench && node --expose-gc lib/perf/parse-all-benchmark.js
scripts.build: tsc && npm run generate-json-schema && npm run tslint
scripts.clean: touch lib && rm -rf lib && mkdir lib
scripts.initBench: if [ ! -d bower_components ]; then bower install -s -f PolymerElements/app-elements PolymerElements/iron-elements PolymerElements/gold-elements PolymerElements/paper-elements PolymerElements/neon-elements GoogleWebComponents/google-web-components ; fi
scripts.quicktest: export QUICK_TESTS=true; npm run build && mocha "lib/test/**/*_test.js"
scripts.test: npm run clean && npm run build && mocha "lib/test/**/*_test.js"
